import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './Contact.css'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '', service_interest: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState(null); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); setSubmitStatus(null); try { await axios.post('/api/contact/', formData); setSubmitStatus('success'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '', service_interest: '' }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error submitting form:', error); setSubmitStatus('error'); } finally { setIsSubmitting(false); } }; const services = [ 'House Extensions', 'Loft Conversions', 'Garage Conversions', 'Property Refurbishments', 'Outdoor Living', 'Bespoke Joinery', 'Landscaping Services', 'Kitchens', 'Bathrooms', 'Other' ]; return (
